privacy.metaDescription: Learn how FATOS.pro collects, uses, and protects your personal data.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: FATOS.pro respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide during registration, including name, email, and birth date for numerological calculations. We also automatically collect data about service usage.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: Your data is used to provide numerological calculations, improve the service, and communicate with you about your account.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We use modern encryption and security methods to protect your data. Only authorized personnel have access to personal data.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, and delete your personal data. To do so, contact us through the contact form.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve website functionality and analyze usage. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about our privacy policy, contact us through the contact form.

terms.metaDescription: Read the terms and conditions for using FATOS.pro services.
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using FATOS.pro, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully before using the service.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By registering on FATOS.pro, you confirm that you have read and agree to these terms of use.

services.title: Service Description
services.content: FATOS.pro provides numerological calculations and analysis based on birth date. Results are for informational purposes.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: You agree to provide accurate information, not violate other users' rights, and not use the service for illegal purposes.

payments.title: Payments and Refunds
payments.content: Payment for premium services is made through secure payment systems. Refunds are possible within 14 days in case of technical issues.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All materials on the site are protected by copyright. Copying and distribution without written permission is prohibited.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: FATOS.pro is not responsible for decisions made based on numerological calculations. The service is provided "as is".

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to change these terms. Changes take effect after publication on the site.

contact.metaDescription: Get in touch with FATOS.pro support team.
contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have a question or need help? Send us a message and we'll get back to you soon.

validation.messageMinLength: Message must be at least 10 characters

success.title: Message Sent!
success.description: Thank you for contacting us. We'll respond to your inquiry soon.

error.title: Error
error.description: Failed to send message. Please try again later.
error.rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests. Please try again in {minutes} minutes.
